cast.name: 赛琳娜·戈麦斯 Selena Gomez
埃里克·阿杰庞 Eric Adjepong

this_title: Selena + Chef: Home for the Holidays Season 1
trans_title: 席琳娜在家过节 第一季
introduction: Gomez is at the top of her game as a musical artist, actor, businesswoman, and philanthropist, but she calls in the experts to help amp up her kitchen skills for the holidays. This year she has invited all-star chefs Eric Adjepong, Alex Guarnaschelli, Michael Symon, and Claudette Zepeda to bring their favorite dishes and culinary wisdom to her home kitchen so they can cook up perfect holiday meals to share with friends and family.
chinese_title: 席琳娜在家过节 第一季
foreign_title: Selena + Chef: Home for the Holidays Season 1
